scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build-files && node build-server.js
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const generate = require('./config.json').generate['sitemap.xml']; if (generate) { require('child_process').execSync('npm run sitemap', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { console.log('\x1b[36m info\x1b[0m  - skipped sitemap.xml'); }"
scripts.chaos-start: npm i && npm run build && npm run start
